com.flight_ticket_search.Dao

Interface FlightDao

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    FlightDaoImpl

    public interface FlightDao

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Airplane getAirplane(java.lang.String model)
      Return Airplane according to its model
      Airport getAirport(java.lang.String airportCode)
      Return Airport according to its code Using the airport code to retrieve the right airport which could be used for the time conversion in the front-end
      boolean lockDB()
      Return whether the database is successfully locked Lock the database to avoid concurrency access.
      boolean removeFlights(java.util.List<java.util.List<java.lang.String>> reservedFlights)
      Return whether the Flights are successfully removed from database Remove flights from database using the reservedFlights, which is a list of string representation of flightNumber and seating information.
      Flight selectFlight(java.lang.String number)
      Return specific Flight from the database Retrieve specific flight from the database to check the seat condition for the reservation service when the client determines to reserve a ticket.
      java.util.List<Flight> selectFlights(java.lang.String airportCode, java.lang.String date, boolean isDeparting)
      Return list of Flights retrieved from database Retrieve list of Flights according to the airport code, departure/arrival date, and type of departure/arrival flight
      boolean unlockDB()
      Unlock the database to continue system business precondition: system is holding the lock and purchase is successfully done

    • Method Detail

      • selectFlights

        java.util.List<Flight> selectFlights(java.lang.String airportCode,
                                     java.lang.String date,
                                     boolean isDeparting)
        Return list of Flights retrieved from database Retrieve list of Flights according to the airport code, departure/arrival date, and type of departure/arrival flight
        Parameters:
        airportCode - code used to specify departure airport
        arrivalDate - time used to specify departure/arrival date
        isDeparting - specify the flight type departing or arriving
        Returns:
        a list of flights

      • selectFlight

        Flight selectFlight(java.lang.String number)
        Return specific Flight from the database Retrieve specific flight from the database to check the seat condition for the reservation service when the client determines to reserve a ticket. precondition: User select specific type of tickets postcondition: All flight contained in the tickets are retrieved
        Parameters:
        number - flight number of the flight also recognized as the key of the flight
        Returns:
        Flight corresponding to the given flight number

      • removeFlights

        boolean removeFlights(java.util.List<java.util.List<java.lang.String>> reservedFlights)
        Return whether the Flights are successfully removed from database Remove flights from database using the reservedFlights, which is a list of string representation of flightNumber and seating information. Return true indicates the purchase is succeed, false indicates failure.
        Parameters:
        reservedFlights - list of string list of [number, seating]
        Returns:
        whether the flight is successfully removed from DB

      • getAirport

        Airport getAirport(java.lang.String airportCode)
        Return Airport according to its code Using the airport code to retrieve the right airport which could be used for the time conversion in the front-end
        Parameters:
        airportCode - 3 digits standard airport code of the US airports
        Returns:
        The airport that matches the airportCode

      • getAirplane

        Airplane getAirplane(java.lang.String model)
        Return Airplane according to its model
        Parameters:
        model - model name of the airplane, like "Boeing, Airbus" etc
        Returns:
        The airplane that matches the model

      • lockDB

        boolean lockDB()
        Return whether the database is successfully locked Lock the database to avoid concurrency access. Precondition: No other teams are holding the lock of the database
        Returns:
        whether DB is successfully locked

      • unlockDB

        boolean unlockDB()
        Unlock the database to continue system business precondition: system is holding the lock and purchase is successfully done
        Returns:
        whether DB is successfully unlocked
